name: Whata dark
description:
• WHILE FIRST START OF THE GAME: if you push 'M' - the game will stop - DON'T PUSH ANY BUTTON! - JUST WAIT SOME SECONDS - it will be resumed!

CONTROLLS:

  • WASD;
  • When inventory is opened - you can turn around by MOUSE;
  • M - inventory;
  • N - sound adjustments;
  • TO USE ITEM IN YOUR INVENTORY - YOU HAVE TO PUSH 'EQUIP' BUTTON THERE;
  • Save button - saves your inventory;
  • Load button - load level from the begining with saved inventory.

HAVE A NICE PLAY!

Paul
